Detailed Description

This file defines operations on thread queues.

int thread_queue_dequeue ( struct thread_queue *const   queue_ptr  ) 

Remove the head of the queue.

Returns:
the index, into thread_table, of the thread removed from the thread queue.
Parameters:
queue_ptr  Points to the thread queue.

void thread_queue_enqueue ( struct thread_queue *const   queue_ptr,
const int  thread_index 
)

Enqueue one thread into the thread queue.

The thread will be placed at the end of the queue.

Parameters:
queue_ptr  Points to the thread queue.
thread_index  Index, into thread_table, of the thread to be inserted into the thread queue.

int thread_queue_head ( const struct thread_queue *const   queue_ptr  ) 

Returns the first thread in the thread_queue.

Returns:
the index, into thread_table, of the first thread in the thread_queue or -1 if the queue is empty.
